channel.title: Clan Chat type
channel.description: How would I make a little chat thing that when a player says something it will only say it to the people that are in a list. Like a command kinda like ::chatroom. I have a command that will start a list of people and then others can type ::join "listname" and they will start to get the message. Also, If i could get help with a way to make a little message that will tell everyone in the list who joined the list and when. If you could help me that would be awesome.

item.title: Clan Chat type
item.dc:creator: @kedonot1 kedonot1
item.description:
@kedonot1 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:6, topic:249793”][quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=329300.msg2574728#msg2574728 date=1228878941]

HAHA! Are you kidding me? This will take weeekssssssssss
Damnit Good luck, If you wanna learn how to do that. Buy a premium java class.
Damnit thats hard!

Are you kidding?
That’s simple.
[/quote]So simple there’s already a tut. Took me 3 minutes to get one for chassy tbh.

Read Chapter Nine of Chassy’s Tutorials.[/quote]
Thought it was actual talking about 100% REAL clan chat, with everthing, making general and shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Clan Chat type
item.dc:creator: @Final_Dawn Final Dawn
item.description:
@Final_Dawn wrote:

Well, Could you help me please?

I have the join list type command and also I have the create list thing done.

I just need to make a way for everyone in the list to communicate without anyone seeing it…Kinda like clan chat

Read full topic
